org.jcatapult.security.servlet
Class CredentialStorageWorkflow

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.security.servlet.CredentialStorageWorkflow
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.jcatapult.servlet.Workflow
public class CredentialStorageWorkflow
extends Object
implements org.jcatapult.servlet.Workflow

This class provides a simple mechanism for locating an existing user object using the CredentialStorage and then storing it into the JCatapultSecurityContextProvider, which is the default implementation of the EnhancedSecurityContextProvider.

          Looks up the user from the CredentialStorage and saves it to the context if it exists.

Method Detail

perform

public void perform(ServletRequest request,
                    ServletResponse response,
                    org.jcatapult.servlet.WorkflowChain workflowChain)
             throws IOException,
                    ServletException
Looks up the user from the CredentialStorage and saves it to the context if it exists. In either case, it calls the chain to proceed and removes the object from the context after the chain has returned.

Specified by:
perform in interface org.jcatapult.servlet.Workflow
Parameters:
request - The request.
response - The response.
workflowChain - The workflow chain.
Throws:
IOException - If the chain throws.
ServletException - If the chain throws.
